Literature.Title: Antimicrobial peptides containing unnatural amino acid exhibit potent bactericidal activity against ESKAPE pathogens.
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Abercrombie JJ, Wong RK, Leung KP

Literature.Title: NOVEL ANTI-MICROBIAL PEPTIDOMIMETIC COMPOUNDS AND METHODS TO CALCULATE ANTI-MICROBIAL ACTIVITY
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Venugopal D, Bhonsle JB

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=50µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MBC=50µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii WRAIR13(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii WRAIR13(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae BAMC 07-18(MBC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MBC=25µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MIC=25µg/ml),Klebsiella aerogenes(MBC=25µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MMC4(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium MMC4(MBC=50µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(MIC=10µM),Mycobacterium fortuitum ATCC 110(MIC=10µM),Francisella tularensis SCHU-S4(MIC=125µg/ml),Bacillus anthracis Ames(MIC=0.98µg/ml),Brucella melitensis 16M(MIC=>500µg/ml),Yersinia pestis C092(MIC=15.6µg/ml)
